import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./ReservationDetails.css';import axios from'axios';import useUserData from'../useUserData';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ReservationDetails(){const[reservations,setReservations]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const{id:user_id}=useUserData();useEffect(()=>{// Fetch reservation data from the server
const fetchReservations=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/mypage/bag',{params:{user_id}});setReservations(response.data);setLoading(false);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching reservation data:',error);setLoading(false);}};fetchReservations();},[user_id]);const handleCancelReservation=async reservationId=>{const confirmCancel=window.confirm('정말로 이 예약을 취소하시겠습니까?');if(!confirmCancel)return;try{const response=await axios.delete("/api/reservations/".concat(reservationId));alert(response.data);setReservations(reservations.filter(reservation=>reservation.count!==reservationId));}catch(error){console.error('Error cancelling reservation:',error);alert('예약 취소 중 오류가 발생했습니다.');}};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"reservation-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uC608\uC57D\uB0B4\uC5ED"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"reservation-underline"}),reservations.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"no-reservations",children:"\uC608\uC57D \uB0B4\uC5ED\uC774 \uC5C6\uC2B5\uB2C8\uB2E4."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\uC608\uC57D \uC2DC\uAC04"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\uBE48\uBC31 \uC88C\uC11D \uBC88\uD638"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\uCDE8\uC18C"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:reservations.map(reservation=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:reservation.reservation_hour}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[reservation.bag_id,"\uBC88 \uBE48\uBC31"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cancelBtnContent",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cancelBtn",onClick:()=>handleCancelReservation(reservation.id),children:"\uCDE8\uC18C"})})})]},reservation.id))})]})]});}export default ReservationDetails;
